name: Prophet Sharing presented by Ashley Blaker & Imran Yusuf

shows.title: Prophet Sharing, with Imran Yusuf and Ashley Blaker
shows.desc:
Two great religions. Two great comedians. The descendants of Abraham may have gone their separate ways but now stand-up comedian friends Ashley Blaker and Imran Yusuf join forces in the most-unlikely double-act since Kermit and Miss Piggy (who neither Ashley nor Imran can eat!). Brought together by a passion for the same football team, the pair unite people of every faith and none with laughter.

A slickly funny stand-up show.'
New York Times on Ashley Blaker

‘Sharp, passionate and uplifting’
Daily Telegraph on Imran Yusuf

Presented by So Comedy & Broken Robot Productions
